item.title: Milly add a quote by Zig Ziglar
item.description: "Of course motivation is not permanent. But then, neither is bathing; but it is something you should do on a regular basis." -- Zig Ziglar

item.title: Milly add a quote by Tom Upton
item.description: "...Life is much simpler if you don’t notice anything...." -- Tom Upton

item.title: Milly add a quote by Jerome K. Jerome
item.description: "I like work: it fascinates me. I can sit and look at it for hours." -- Jerome K. Jerome

item.title: Milly add a quote by Walter Cronkite
item.description: "Whatever the cost of our libraries, the price is cheap compared to that of an ignorant nation." -- Walter Cronkite

item.title: Milly add a quote by Joel Osteen
item.description: "You cannot expect victory and plan for defeat." -- Joel Osteen

item.title: Milly add a quote by Pedro Okoro
item.description: "There is a difference between the fact and the truth. The fact is what you may be experiencing at any particular point in time in your life, the day-to-day reality of life, the struggles, the challenges, the issues and the problems that you face on a daily basis. On the other hand, the truth is what God’s Word says about the particular situation you are going through or the challenges you currently face...God expects you to confess and proclaim the truth of His Word, not the fact of your daily struggles!" -- Pedro Okoro

item.title: Milly add a quote by William W. Purkey
item.description: "You've gotta dance like there's nobody watching, Love like you'll never be hurt, Sing like there's nobody listening, And live like it's heaven on earth." -- William W. Purkey

item.title: Milly add a quote by Gary Paulsen
item.description: "I read like a wolf eats. I read myself to sleep every night." -- Gary Paulsen

item.title: Milly add a quote by Charles M. Schulz
item.description: "Sometimes I feel that life has passed me by... Do you ever feel that way, Charlie Brown?" "I feel that it has knocked me down and walked all over me!" -- Charles M. Schulz

item.title: Milly add a quote by Irving Stone
item.description: "There are no faster or firmer friendships than those formed between people who love the same books." -- Irving Stone

item.title: Milly add a quote by Mae West
item.description: "You only live once, but if you do it right, once is enough." -- Mae West

item.title: Milly add a quote by Vivian Greene
item.description: "Life isn't about waiting for the storm to pass...It's about learning to dance in the rain." -- Vivian Greene

item.title: Milly add a quote by Steve Maraboli
item.description: "How would your life be different if…You stopped making negative judgmental assumptions about people you encounter? Let today be the day…You look for the good in everyone you meet and respect their journey." -- Steve Maraboli

item.title: Milly add a quote by Lyndon B. Johnson
item.description: "A man without a vote is a man without protection." -- Lyndon B. Johnson

item.title: Milly add a quote by Rick Mercer
item.description: "Do the unexpected. Take 20 minutes out of your day, do what young people all over the world are dying to do: vote." -- Rick Mercer

item.title: Milly add a quote by Greg Iles
item.description: "I will do those things which make me happy today and which I can also live with ten years from now." -- Greg Iles

item.title: Milly add a quote by Deborah Reber
item.description: "Letting go doesn't mean that you don't care about someone anymore. It's just realizing that the only person you really have control over is yourself." -- Deborah Reber

item.title: Milly add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on." -- Robert Frost
